author: hashutosh
msg: HIVE-8315 : CBO : Negate condition underestimates selectivity which results in an in-efficient plan (Harish Butani via Ashutosh Chauhan)

author: stsp
msg: In svnsync, deprecate the --trust-server-cert option and add the following
new options exposing all SSL failure modes the underlying API can handle:
certificates even if the server hostname does not
match the certificate's common name attribute
certificates with failures other than the above
(svnsync_options): Add and document the new options.
(sub_main): Handle new options and use svn_cmdline_create_auth_baton2().
